responsibilities: Design, develop, and deploy production-ready solutions for customers.
Enable seamless integrations with mParticle's technology and data ecosystem.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including Customer Success, Professional Services, and Production Engineering.
Build scalable integrations tailored to customer requirements and specifications.
Enhance the efficiency of Professional Services Engineering by improving documentation, tools, and reusable code templates.
Partner closely with Customer Success and Professional Services teams to ensure timely delivery of high-value solutions.
Translate customer needs into detailed technical requirements and accurately estimate development efforts.
Rigorously test and validate integrations to guarantee reliable and performant deployments.
qualifications: Problem-solving mindset and strong attention to detail.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to collaborate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Thrive in fast-paced, ambiguous environments as a self-starter with a proactive attitude.
Team player who actively supports others and contributes to a positive team dynamic.
Familiarity with digital marketing tools such as analytics, attribution, ad serving, DMPs, push notifications, and social media platforms (bonus skill).
analysis:
The job responsibilities focus on designing, developing, and deploying production-ready solutions, enabling integrations with a technology and data ecosystem, and collaborating with cross-functional teams. The responsibilities also include building scalable integrations, enhancing efficiency through improved documentation and tools, and translating customer needs into technical requirements. There is no mention of working with Generative AI or language models in the responsibilities.

The skills required include problem-solving, communication, collaboration, and proficiency in Python. There is no specific mention of skills related to Generative AI or language models, such as experience with machine learning, natural language processing, or specific AI frameworks and tools.

Overall, the job description does not explicitly indicate involvement with Generative AI or language models. The focus is more on integration, collaboration, and technical development without specific reference to AI technologies.
